comment: Dont expect to get an A. She doesn't give them at all. Her feedback on your papers will praise you for how well your essay is written but she still will give you a B or C because of small (and i mean small) errors, such as the improper position of a period on a reference page. And she will find every little error she can to ensure you dont get a A

Enjoyed her alot!! She worked with me when I was having personal issues and gave me great advice. I liked her humorous approach to things and I looked forward to her class. Her coursework was pretty simple, everything kinda ran in a set schedule.  Simple assignments and enough time to work on the papers. But she grades HARSH.

I really liked this prof! If you would consider yourself to be a legitimately good writer, then def take her! Three 3-5 page papers & a 5-7 page paper. You'll do a few group assignments on occasion, but no big deal. Def. get the text book & bring to class, she expects you to read beforehand but it's not bad at all. Very funny, nice & laid back.
